channel.title: My Server
channel.description:
Ok lets get straight to the point, im an idiot, ye thats right i dont know that 1+1 is 5 (joke) :) Im having trouble port forwarding my server and need help, also is there any way of using your own IP adress instead of using No-Ip. 1 last thing, and i know this is alot to ask but if anyone is creating a server and needs a mod or admin or anything it would be greatly aprreciated if i could forget my server and just be a mod on another one. :| :confused:
Thank you, :)
